snippet: Now that the hungry can use cellphones and food-delivery apps to order meals, delivery is no longer confined to the apartment or the office — or even to a place with an address.
abstract: Food delivery is no longer confined to the apartment, office or even to a place with an address now that the hungry can use cellphones and food-delivery apps to summon food to the spot where they stand; many New York City restaurants are more than willing to serve customers wherever they wish, but some recall particularly troubling or problematic delivery requests.
lead_paragraph: Now that the hungry can use cellphones and food-delivery apps to order meals, delivery is no longer confined to the apartment or the office — or even to a place with an address.

headline.main: In Age of Anywhere Delivery, the Food Meets You for Lunch
headline.print_headline: In Age of Anywhere Delivery, The Food Meets You for Lunch
